Package net.mtrop.doom.map

Class DoomMap

java.lang.Object
net.mtrop.doom.map.DoomMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
MapView<DoomVertex,​DoomLinedef,​DoomSidedef,​DoomSector,​DoomThing>
public class DoomMap
extends Object
Doom map in Doom Format.
Author:
Matthew Tropiano
